name: NHS England Low Priority Treatment - tadalafil once daily
title: Tadalafil once daily cost per 1000 patients
description: Cost of tadalafil once daily per 1000 patients
why_it_matters: Tadalafil is a drug similar to sildenafil (Viagra), used for erectile dysfunction.  There is no evidence that taking the low
2.5mg or 5mg dose every day is more effective than taking a 10mg or 20mg dose when required.
